pageProduct.name: Sambucol Throat Lozenges 20
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Sambucol Black Elderberry Immune Defence Lozenges are formulated with Black Elderberry, Vitamin C, Zinc & soothing Honey. Convenient on the go immune support everyday.

Soothe the throat with a tasty Black Elderberry Lozenge.
Great for the family, Sambucol Black Elderberry Immune Defence Lozenges:
- Support immune system health & function
- Provide Antioxidant support that help reduce free radicals formed in the body.

Suitable For: Adults

Size: 20

Directions

To support general health and wellbeing and immune system health. Or as recommended by your health professional.
Adults: 1-2 lozenges hourly (maximum 16 per day)
Children 9-12 years: 1 lozenge every 1-2 hours (maximum 8 per day)
Children 6-9 years: 1 lozenge every 3 hours (maximum 4 per day)

Not suitable for children under 6 years of age. Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet. Product contains 7.1g of maltitol and 6.4g of sorbitol at the maximum recommended daily dose which may have a laxative effect or cause diarrhoea.

Store below 25°C.

STORAGE AND DISPOSAL

Do not use if blister foil is broken.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25C
